name: Forest Fenn
description:
Forest Fenn is a whimsical adventure platforming game that intertwines themes of music and nature. In this game, use musical instruments to interact with the forest around you and seek out a legendary treasure.

Credits
Team Members:

  • Zihang Lyu
  • Advait Deshpande
  • Beijia Chen
  • Marlina Bowring

Music by: Steven Poeschel
Voiced by: Nick Dolloff
Additional art:  Yash Poddar
